source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
           st.Name,
           st.CountryRegionCode,
           st.[Group],
           RANK() OVER(ORDER BY (st.[SalesYTD]) DESC) AS 'RangVentesYTD',
           RANK() OVER(ORDER BY (st.[SalesLastYear]) DESC) AS 'RangVentesLastYear',
           (st.salesYTD)-(st.SalesLastYear) AS 'Am√©liorationNetteVentes',
           (st.SalesYTD - st.CostYTD),
           (st.SalesLastYear - st.CostLastYear),
            GETDATE()
    FROM SalesTerritory AS st
